news_header: Three stocks with strong income characteristics recommended for investors.
news_text: On January 30, three stocks are highlighted for investors: Sandvik AB, which has seen a 69.3% increase in earnings estimates and offers a 1.6% dividend yield; OP Bancorp, with a 2% increase in earnings estimates and a 3.6% dividend yield; and Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc., with a 2.9% increase in earnings estimates and a 3.2% dividend yield. All three companies hold a Zacks Rank of #1, indicating strong potential for growth.
